meanings.definition: To express in terms of parameters.
meanings.sent1: She parametrizes the equation to include all possible values.
meanings.sent2: The scientist parametrizes the data to make it easier to analyze.
meanings.sent3: The chef parametrizes the recipe by listing all the ingredients.
meanings.sent4: His creativity parametrizes the project, adding a unique touch.
meanings.sent5: The artist parametrizes the colors to create a harmonious painting.

meanings.definition: To determine or fix the parameters of.
meanings.sent1: He parametrizes the settings to ensure optimal performance.
meanings.sent2: The engineer parametrizes the machine for maximum efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The cat parametrizes the perfect spot for a nap in the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her leadership parametrizes the team towards success.
meanings.sent5: The coach parametrizes the training schedule for peak performance.
